ygData.subject: Re: Rivervale to Qeynos?
ygData.msgSnippet: I found that prices were good in Rivervale.  I teamed up with a halfling cleric, and because my charisma is so high I was buying stuff cheaper than even the
ygData.messageBody:
I found that prices were good in Rivervale. I teamed up with a halfling
cleric, and because my charisma is so high I was buying stuff cheaper than
even the halfling could. Can't understand why nobody likes you, unless
you've lowered your faction somehow. If you kill the goblins in Misty
Thickett you'll improve you faction with the little ones.

Sharana
9th level Bard, Innoruuk
Divine Wind


-----Original Message-----
From: weya@... [mailto:weya@...]
Sent: 07 July 1999 13:56
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Rivervale to Qeynos?


From: weya@...

Greetings,

Well, I figured out how to get my songs on the hotkeys
... even applied it to a magic user "sister" of mine. <s>
I've been running around Rivervale, twisting my little
heart out (working pretty good I think) and killing
everything in sight.

I have one problem though ... none of the vendors like
me. Any npc that will sell to me looks at me
"apprehensively". I went to every npc I could find and
found one that was disinterested ... but he wouldn't
(couldn't) sell to me. So I'm making crap money on my
loot. At this rate, I'm never gonna be able to even
afford songs, let alone any equipment (sewing kit &
patterns for example).

So I need help! Either, point me to someone in Rivervale
who will offer me decent prices or ... If there isn't
anyone that fits that bill, then I think I need to move
on to Qeynos. In that case, I need good directions from
Rivervale to Qeynos. Every travel guide I've found gives
the directions the opposite way around ... and they're
not easily reversed.

Thanks again,
Wynsong
Woodelf Bard, Level 3
Rivervale, Qeynos


--
~~~ Remember that our illusion of control is just
that ... an illusion ~~~

weya@...
ICQ#1976509
